title: Lesson 17 How do you do? 你好!
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What are Michael Baker and Jeremy Short's jobs? 听录音，然后回答问题。迈克尔·贝克和杰里米·肖特是做什么工作的?

text_and_translation.text: MR. JACKSON: Come and meet our employees, Mr. Richards.
text_and_translation.translation: 杰克逊先生：来见见我们的雇员，理查兹先生。

text_and_translation.text: MR. RICHARDS: Thank you, Mr. Jackson.
text_and_translation.translation: 理查兹先生：谢谢您，杰克逊先生。

text_and_translation.text: MR. JACKSON: This is Nicola Grey, and this is Claire Taylor.
text_and_translation.translation: 杰克逊先生：这位是尼古拉·格雷，这位是克莱尔·泰勒。

text_and_translation.text: MR. RICHARDS: How do you do?
MR. JACKSON: Those women are very hard-working. What are their jobs?
text_and_translation.translation: 杰克逊先生：那些姑娘很勤快。她们是做什么工作的？
杰克逊先生：她们是电脑录入员。

text_and_translation.text: MR. JACKSON: This is Michael Baker, and this is Jeremy Short.
text_and_translation.translation: 杰克逊先生：这位是迈克尔·贝克，这位是杰里米·肖特。

text_and_translation.text: MR. RICHARDS: How do you do?
MR. RICHARDS: They aren't very busy! What are their jobs?
text_and_translation.translation: 理查兹先生：他们不很忙吧！他们是做什么工作的？

text_and_translation.text: MR. JACKSON: They're sales reps. They're very lazy.
text_and_translation.translation: 杰克逊先生：他们是推销员，他们非常懒。

text_and_translation.text: MR. RICHARDS: Who is this young man?
text_and_translation.translation: 理查兹先生：这个年轻人是谁？

text_and_translation.text: MR. JACKSON: This is Jim. He's our office assistant.
text_and_translation.translation: 杰克逊先生：他是吉姆，我们的办公室助理。

notes.title: How do you do?
notes.describe: 用于初次见面时的问候语，回应时也说'How do you do?'

notes.title: sales reps
notes.describe: 销售代表，负责销售和推广产品。

notes.title: office assistant
notes.describe: 办公室助理，负责办公室日常事务和辅助工作。
